column4: hello!  can some one help me ? i reinstalled my windows xp as vista and cant start up ubuntu !
hello!  can some one help me ? i reinstalled my windows xp as vista and cant start up ubuntu !
you have to reinstall grub, google it, I don't remember the exact things you have to do, it involves a bootable media tho :)
grub is the program that you see when choosing which OS to boot to :)
